english.segment1: In the beginning there was no other God but You. now and forever there is no other God like You. You're the name above all names. all eternity will sing Your praise, and
english.segment2: Chorus. Every knee will bow , every tongue will shout. that Jesus is the Lord. Every tribe and tongue, every nation. will worship at Your throne. every knee will bow
english.segment3: You humbled Yourself and died a sinners death for us. You were exalted, risen hallelujah. You're the name above all names. and all eternity will sing Your praise
english.segment4: Bridge. to the glory of Your name. to the greatness of Your fame. You were crucified to make a way. let Your gospel be proclaimed. and the ends of the earth saved. Jesus, You will reign and on that day
